Package com.perples.recosdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RECOMonitoringListener
    The RECOMonitoringListener interface receives the results when strtMonitoringForRegion method is called.
    RECORangingListener
    The RECORangingListener interface receives the results when startRangingBeaconsInRegion method is called.
    RECOServiceConnectListener
    The RECOServiceConnectListener interface receives the results when bind method is called.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RECOBeacon
    The RECOBeacon class represents a beacon that was encountered during region monitoring or region ranging.
    RECOBeaconManager
    The RECOBeaconManager class provides interfaces handling RECOBeacon-related events.
    RECOBeaconManagerHelper
    The RECOBeaconManagerHelper class is for RECOBeaconManager.
    RECOBeaconRegion
    The RECOBeaconRegion class defines a type of region based on the device's proximity to a beacon.
    RECOBeaconRegionInfoParcel
    The RECOBeaconRegionInfoParcel class is for RECOBeaconManager.
    RECOBeaconService
    The RECOBeaconService class is for RECOBeaconManager.
    RECOMonitoringResult
    The RECOMonitoringResult class is for RECOBeaconManager when monitoring.
    RECOMonitoringState
    The RECOMonitoringState class is for RECOBeaconManager when monitoring.
    RECORangingResult
    The RECORangingResult class is for RECOBeaconManager when ranging.
    RECORangingState
    The RECORangingState class is for RECOBeaconManager when ranging.
    RECORssiAccumulator
    The RECOAccumulator class contains utilities to support RECO SDK Package.
    RECOUtil
    The RECOUtil class contains utilities to support RECO SDK Package.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RECOBeaconRegionState
    The RECObeaconRegionState represents the relationship of the current location to the region boundaries.
    RECOProximity
    The RECOProximity represents the relative distance to a RECOBeacon.
